src:
V novi številki Primorskih novic preberite
06 Nov 2019, 19:27 by Spletno uredništvo

Silovita eksplozija, ki je stresla vso stavbo in zbudila domačine okrog glavnega trga na Škofijah, je v sredo ob pol petih zjutraj oznanila, da je po številnih bankomatih po državi prišel na vrsto bankomat na Škofijah.



Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA

Na zemljišču ob morju naj bi zrasel kulturni center
Občini Izola je na sredini javni dražbi Primorja v stečaju v Ajdovščini kot predkupni upravičenki uspelo kupiti zemljišče nekdanje tovarne Mala oprema. Za 660.000 evrov, kar je precej več od izklicne cene 380.000 evrov. Na tistem območju načrtujejo gradnjo kulturnega centra.
Hoteli Bernardin nadaljujejo prenovo kompleksa
Hotel Histrion so v ponedeljek zapustili zadnji gostje, v sredo pa so že začeli prazniti sobe. Hoteli Bernardin namreč začenjajo drugi naložbeni ciklus - prenovili bodo hotel Histrion, bazenski del in center dobrega počutja.
Priloga TV Okno
Kempinski prijavljen za najem plaže
Na javni razpis Okolja Piran je za najem dela portoroške plaže prispela ena prijava.
Občina Vipava: bodo iz omar padali okostnjaki?
Nadzorni odbor je preveril poslovanje zavoda Trg in zaključni račun občine za lani.
Dogovor z Morsom propadel
Postojnski župan Igor Marentič je sporni predlog novega začasnega dogovora z ministrstvom za obrambo glede osrednjega vojaškega vadišča umaknil z dnevnega reda sredine seje občinskega sveta.
Mef je moral najeti minibus
“V Ljubljano nas gre nastopat toliko, da sem moral najeti minibus,” pravi kantavtor Drago Mislej - Mef, ki bo na posebnem koncertu v nedeljo ob 19. uri v Linhartovi dvorani Cankarjevega doma z dvema bendoma in glasbenimi gosti predstavil svoj novi album Ma ne že spet ... Mef.
Začetek slovenskega karate pokala zveze JKA
Karate klub Samurai Sežana je gostil uvodno tekmo sezone pokala slovenske zveze japonskega karateja (JKA) za vse kategorije.
text:
Read the new issue of Primorska News
06 Nov 2019, 19:27 by Web Editor

A violent explosion, which shook the entire building and woke the locals around the main square in Diocese, announced at midnight on Wednesday morning that it had come to a series of ATMs in the Dioceses across the country.



Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA

A cultural center is set to grow on the land by the sea
In the middle of the public auction of the Primorje bankruptcy bankruptcy in Ajdovščina, the municipality of Izola managed to buy the land of the former Mala oprema factory as a pre-emptive beneficiary. For € 660,000, well above the starting price of € 380,000. A cultural center is being built in the area.
The Bernardin Hotels are continuing the renovation of the complex
The Histrion Hotel was abandoned by its last guests on Monday, and the rooms were already empty on Wednesday. The Bernardin Hotels are embarking on a second investment cycle - they will renovate the Histrion Hotel, the pool area and the wellness center.
Attachment TV Window
Kempinski registered for beach rental
One application was submitted for the tender of the Environment of Piran for renting part of the beach of Portorož.
Municipality of Vipava: will skeletons fall from the cabinets?
The Supervisory Board reviewed the operations of the Trg Institute and the final accounts of the municipality last year.
The Mors deal failed
Postojna Mayor Igor Marentic withdrew the controversial proposal for a new interim agreement with the Ministry of Defense regarding the central military training ground from the agenda of the mid-session of the municipal council.
Mef had to rent a minibus
"There is so much going on us in Ljubljana that I had to rent a minibus," says singer-songwriter Drago Mislej - Mef, who will present his new album Ma ne at a special concert on Sunday at 7pm in Linhart Hall of Cankarjev dom with two bands and musical guests. again ... Mep.
The start of the Slovenian JKA Karate Cup
Samurai Sežana Karate Club hosted the inaugural match of the Slovenian Karate Association (JKA) Cup season for all categories.
